GLUE-Math with POSIX standard
Test Suite:
  Common Logarithm

Polymorphism Pattern: Real variable -> Real solution
>>> RMath.log10(x)
  (x)   float     double             long double         
  0.0  -Infinity -Infinity          -Infinity            
  0.2  -0.698970 -0.698970004336019 -0.698970004336018781
